mapper.insert: insert into User( u_date ,u_id ,u_pw u_age ,u_addr ,u_gender ,u_email ,u_birthday) value( #{u_date} ,#{u_id} ,#{u_pw} ,#{u_age} ,#{u_addr} ,#{u_gender} ,#{u_email} ,#{u_birthday})
mapper.select: select u_number from user where u_id = #{u_id} and u_pw = #{u_pw}
mapper.update: update user set u_email = #{u_email} where u_number = #{u_number}
